e: ￹`O~ `raraw~ `ako~ `konini~.￺I made this mistake.￻這是我的過失
￹`moraraway~ / `ma~`raraw~`ay~ `to~ `lalan~￺to go astray / get lost￻走錯了路，迷失了路，迷失方向
￹`O~ `ci~`raraw~`ay~ `kako~.￺1. I am associated with an error.  2. I am a sinner.￻1. 我有過失  2. 我是罪人
￹`Moraraw~ / `ma~`raraw~ `ko~ `caciyaw~ `ako~￺I said the wrong thing.￻我說錯了話
￹`Pa~`raraw~ `koya~ `tamdaw~ `i~ `takowanan~.￺He made me out to be a sinner (when I was innocent).￻他把罪加諸於我(他誣賴我)
￹`Mapa~`raraw~ `nira~ `kako~.￺1. He made me an innocent party look guilty.  2. He misled me.￻1. 他誣陷我  2. 他導我入歧途
d.f: ￹￺as used in the biblical context it has become the word sin￻聖經上當罪講
